observation_text: (1) Posen (dance music until 1 a.m. G.M.T.); (2) Posen, relaying concert from the Philharmonic Hall at Warsaw; (3) Huizen, relaying from the Concert House at Amsterdam; (4) Eiffel Tower, relaying PTT Paris; (5) Cologne, relaying from Düsseldorf, a talk on the painter Albrecht Dürer; (6) Stuttgart, poetry reading, followed by chamber music; (7) yes, Hamburg; (8) Kattowitz, talk: “Poland, Past and Present,” by Prof. Dyboski; (9) possibly Copenhagen, but cannot confirm, as details are not published in the programme; (10) Münster relaying Cologne (chimes from the studio); (11) yes, this was the opera, Le Chemineau (Xavier Leroux), relayed from the Theatre de la Capitole by Radio Toulouse, apparently relayed by some other station, but cannot trace; (12) Barcelona (EAJ1).
full_text: Drummer (Maltby): (1) Posen (dance music until 1 a.m. G.M.T.); (2) Posen, relaying concert from the Philharmonic Hall at Warsaw; (3) Huizen, relaying from the Concert House at Amsterdam; (4) Eiffel Tower, relaying PTT Paris; (5) Cologne, relaying from Düsseldorf, a talk on the painter Albrecht Dürer; (6) Stuttgart, poetry reading, followed by chamber music; (7) yes, Hamburg; (8) Kattowitz, talk: “Poland, Past and Present,” by Prof. Dyboski; (9) possibly Copenhagen, but cannot confirm, as details are not published in the programme; (10) Münster relaying Cologne (chimes from the studio); (11) yes, this was the opera, Le Chemineau (Xavier Leroux), relayed from the Theatre de la Capitole by Radio Toulouse, apparently relayed by some other station, but cannot trace; (12) Barcelona (EAJ1).
